creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: Eight-armed chandelier with original hurricane shades. Shaft carved with pineapple cutting; dished bobeches hung with cut pear drops. Top of baluster shaft finished with domed piece of flat cut glass with pear drops; bottom with a finial. Arms and hurricane shades rendered pale violet in tone through action of Sun. Metal core of fixture silvered.
title: Eight-armed chandelier
